Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2013 05:04PM Lagatta wrote: I too have extranodal spread.  2/7 nodes are positive with one have extranodal spread.  I have a stage 3, 8cm tumour, Grade III, ER/PR negative, HER2 Positive!!!  They also found a 3cm DCIS SITU tumour!  All this and mammogram didn't pick up anything!  I think that the stage, grade and number of positive nodes are more important predictors than the estranodal spread.
Posts.Title: What is extranodal spread? Jubby Lagatta
